title: High GPU memory usage on master
body_html:
Running cyclegan from https://github.com/junyanz/pytorch-CycleGAN-and-pix2pix on master takes huge amount of memory (>11G with default options). It only takes 3.5G on 0.3 and 0.2 branches.

The memory usage increases as I run more iteration. It seems some tensors are not freed properly.

I remember running on a pre-ATen-merge version without such issue.

Repro command:

python train.py --dataroot ./datasets/maps --name maps_cyclegan --model cycle_gan --no_dropout --niter 1 --niter_decay 0 --no_html --max_dataset_size 10 --batchSize 1

By the way, this doesn't happen on the other model in the repo, pix2pix
